greenbananas.game.gamepiece

Class Generator

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenbananas.game.gamepiece.Generator

  • public class Generator
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Generator. Generators generate game pieces at a given interval. The color and order of the generated game pieces can be modified along with the interval and the total amount of generated game pieces.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Generator.ColorMode
      The various ways colors of generated GamePieces are determined

    • Constructor Detail

      • Generator

        public Generator(double x,
                 double y,
                 int framesPerGenerate,
                 int maxGenerations,
                 java.awt.Color[] colors,
                 Generator.ColorMode colorMode)
        Creates a new Generator Object
        Parameters:
        x - The X-coordinate of the generator
        y - The Y-coordinate of the generator
        framesPerGenerate - The amount of frames that pass between generations
        maxGenerations - The total amount of GamePieces the generator should produce
        colors - The colors of the generated GamePieces
        colorMode - How colors of generated game pieces are determined

    • Method Detail

      • act

        Generates a new GamePiece if the conditions are right
        Parameters:
        gamePieces - The list of GamePieces maintained by a Level
        Postcondition
        A new GamePiece may be added to the gamePieces list
